title: Evolve SMS Unlocked Cracked 1.9.5 apk + Top 10 Themes Collection
description:
What Does This app do? :
- The No. 1 SMS App (Non RAM sucker) on Google Play
- Do you hate Gtalk+SMS=Hangout ? then this app is 4 u
- Perfect replacement for HANGOUTS

What's new
Version 1.9.5:
- Smoother paging between conversations
- Smoother scrolling on conversation list
- Smoothed out message animations
- Performance improvements when receiving a new message
- New addon theme options to color status and navigation bars
- Bug fixes
See the Get Help section of settings for a full changelog!

Features of app :
A beautiful and smooth interface for sliding between conversations so everything is just a swipe away
- Full multimedia support including sending pictures, videos, audio, contacts, GIFs and your location
- A popup that allows you full access to anything in the app and looks great
- Group messaging support
- Full Light Flow support
- 2 different widgets with lockscreen support
- Swipe to delete conversations
- Batch deleting messages
- Archiving messages
- Fully customizable notifications
- Password protection
- Full emoji support (850+ emojis, Android emoji or iOS 7 style emojis)
- Android Wear support
- Desktop messaging through Pushbullet and EndlessJabber
- 3 theme options: light, dark and black
- 3 different layouts: Evolve, Hangouts, and Classic
- Facebook and Google+ cover photo integration
- Facebook contact photo integration
- Night mode
- Apply addon themes to fully customize every aspect of look in the app
- More MMS options (locations, GIFs and contacts)
- Message backup through Dropbox
- Private inbox
- Scheduled SMS messages
- Personalized mass messages

Features of this mod
*Removed all types of ads
*Customization Pack & Features Pack Unlocked By Default in all app purchases bought
*Paid Modded Cracked Elite Premium Unlocked APK
